newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Cascade profit estimates up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Cascade profit estimates up.

text.p: -- SoundView Financial analyst Michael Karfopoulos on Friday raised his earnings estimates for Cascade Communications Corp for 1996 and 1997.

-- In a reseach report, Karfopoulos said he raised fiscal 1996 profit estimates to $0.71 a share from his prior rating of $0.67. He raised 1997 profit estimates to $1.10 a share from his previous estimate of $1.00.
-- Karfopoulos maintained his ratings at short-term and long-term buy on Cascade, the report said.
-- Cascade shares fell 10 to 76-1/2 in early trading.

-- Cascade posted third quarter earnings of $0.21 versus $0.07 a year ago after the close of trading on Thursday, which exceeded published analysts' consensus estimates by $0.02 a share, but the stock fell sharply in after-hours trading.
-- Securities analysts have said the disappointment lay in comparing Casade's sequential quarterly earnings growth.
